verbs.description: [ARG0: FBI agents] [V: referred] [ARG1: to Trump supporters] [ARG2: as " retarded "] [ARGM-LOC: in instant messages revealed in a bombshell report released Thursday by the Justice Department 's inspector general on the FBI 's handling of the Clinton email investigation] .

FBI agents referred to Trump supporters as " retarded " in [ARG1: instant messages] [V: revealed] [ARGM-LOC: in a bombshell report released Thursday by the Justice Department 's inspector general on the FBI 's handling of the Clinton email investigation] .
